text: 1:18 Esekiel 20:18; 1 Korin 6:20; 7:23; 1 Pita 4:3Ezɨ ia fo, ia uan ovavibar arazir kuraba isa dagh amuava dar gɨn zui. Arazir kaba, da dagheba puvatɨ. Ezɨ God ia givezegha ian arazir kuraba gɨn amada. God ia givezezir dughiamɨn, a nguazir kamɨn bizir ikuvitam anɨngizir puvatɨ, mati silva ko gol. Puvatɨ.
